entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
